    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Esterification of cellulose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Esterifizierung von Zellulose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Estérification de cellulose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esterification da celulose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esterificazione di cellulosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Esterification της κυτταρίνης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esterification de la celulosa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the conversion of cellulose into cellulose ethanoate, also known as acetate, through an esterification reaction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acetate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cellulose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cellulose ethanoate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">esterification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Konvertierung von 
Zellulose in Zelluloseethanoate, alias -azetat, durch eine 
Esterifizierungreaktion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre la conversion de la cellulose
dans l'ethanoate de cellulose, également connue sous le nom 
d'acétate, par une réaction d'estérification.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a conversão da celulose no 
ethanoate da celulose, sabida também como o acetato, com uma reação
do esterification.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la conversione di cellulosa 
nel ethanoate della cellulosa, anche conosciuta come l'acetato, con 
una reazione di esterificazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τη μετατροπή της 
κυτταρίνης στην κυτταρίνη ethanoate, επίσης γνωστή ως οξικό 
άλας, μέσω μιας esterification αντίδρασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra la conversión de la 
celulosa en ethanoate de la celulosa, también conocida como acetato, 
con una reacción del esterification.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
